SU-FIRSTRUN-TASKS(8) System Manager's Manual SU-FIRSTRUN-TASKS(8)

NAME

softwareupdate_firstrun_tasks

SYNOPSIS

softwareupdate_firstrun_tasks

— macOS Software Update start-up service

DESCRIPTION

softwareupdate_firstrun_tasks is a service that runs when your system starts up
and softwareupdated runs for the very first time.

(Users should not run softwareupdate_firstrun_tasks manually.)

SEE ALSO

softwareupdate(8)
softwareupdated(8)
softwareupdate_download_service(8)
suhelperd(8)

2017-20-01 macOS
